hero.name: Ruden Mendez Acuna
hero.specialty: Specialized in 3D modeling, SolidWorks and 3D printing
hero.location: ELAC - East Los Angeles College, Los Angeles, CA
hero.description: Student passionate about mechanical design and digital manufacturing. Experience in creating 3D models with SolidWorks and design for 3D printing. Focused on developing innovative solutions through additive manufacturing technology.

items.title: Mechanical Engineering
items.description: Comprehensive training in mechanical engineering principles, design and manufacturing

items.title: SolidWorks Certification
items.description: Advanced mastery of 3D modeling and parametric design

items.title: 3D Printing Specialization
items.description: Design for additive manufacturing and model optimization

items.title: 3D Printed Robotic Arm
items.description: Design and fabrication of a 4-axis robotic arm using FDM 3D printing with optimized mechanical components.
items.results: 70% cost reduction compared to commercial alternatives

items.title: Planetary Gear System
items.description: 3D modeling and simulation of planetary gearbox with motion analysis.

items.title: Custom Camera Mount
items.description: Ergonomic design of adjustable camera mount with quick mounting system.
items.results: Functional and lightweight product with excellent finish

items.title: Mechanical Hand Prosthesis
items.description: Development of low-cost functional hand prosthesis through 3D printing.

items.title: Modular Desk Organizer
items.description: Modular organization system with interchangeable parts designed parametrically.
items.results: 15+ different variations of the same base design

items.title: Mini Wind Turbine
items.description: Functional wind turbine model with aerodynamic blade analysis.
items.results: Effective power generation at prototype scale

items.title: SolidWorks Associate Certification (CSWA)
items.description: Official certification in 3D design and parametric modeling with SolidWorks

items.title: ELAC Academic Excellence
items.description: Recognition for outstanding academic performance in engineering courses

items.title: Outstanding Design Project
items.description: Best mechanical design project of the semester - 3D Robotic Arm

items.title: Maker Faire LA - Participant
items.description: Exhibition of 3D printing and mechanical design projects

items.title: Digital Design Portfolio

items.title: SolidWorks Tutor
